ygData.subject: 256k Magix + EverQuest = Low Lag ??? Please comment!
ygData.msgSnippet: Who is using Magix to play EverQuest? Care to share ur experience with us? Have any of u experience bad lag? My ping/lag used to be very good until 2 days ago.
ygData.messageBody:
Who is using Magix to play EverQuest? Care to share ur experience with us? Have
any of u experience bad lag?

My ping/lag used to be very good until 2 days ago. Since then, everyday I went
home from work (around 8pm) and log into EQ, my lag meter show constant 60%
packet lost for incoming and outgoing data. The strange thing is my ping is VERY
good, it's around 200-300 constantly for incoming and outgoing data. Because of
the huge packet lost, I was not able to enjoy the game. But things started to
get better at around 10:45pm, my ping remains the same and my packet lost drop
till less than 10% for incoming and outgoing.

What is wrong with Magix? Should I switch to cable? Cable user pls comment.
